text: James Steele Gracey (born August 24, 1927) is a former United States Coast Guard admiral. He was the 17th Commandant of the United States Coast Guard from 1982 to 1986. He was born in Newton, Massachusetts. He was active during the Korean War and the Vietnamese War.http://www.uscg.mil/history/WEBORALHISTORY/Gracey_Interview_1_12.pdf ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:People from Newton, Massachusetts Category:Military people from Massachusetts
title: James S. Gracey
